channel.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
channel.description:
Suggestion 1:
I think there should be a board/official topic for requesting an award that wont harm your chances. Kind of like going and applying for a job.
Personally, I believe that I deserve the Web Developer cup because of my website that I'm working on and the Batman award because I do help and try not to flame anyone.
[quote="Moparisthebest"]I have noticed that you don't flame people and seem to be a good person.[/quote]
^ Actual quote from t3H mopar
Suggestion 2:
I also think that you could use a new homepage mopar ;). Stuff like a page that steals the new news from RuneScape, a new server status page, a download section, etc.
Thats all for now :) I'm too tired to type any thing else lol.

item.description:

Fr33sc4p3:

Why not add your news page on your homepage to load the news from a slq database so you can add it easily and it would be updated more often.

It is already set up like that.

item.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t like the idea of people requesting awards, so a no to that one.

About a new homepage, I am not good at writing good looking webpages, if someone writes me a new one and I like it better, I’ll put it up, otherwise I can add some new content or something to the existing one.

The serverstatus page and the moparscape homepage will be getting a major upgrade soon, just wait and see.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I agree, there should be a board, but I think all threads/posts there should be made unviewable to everyone but the posters/moderators/administrators. The problem with that, is that there is not a mod out for SMF that supports this. The only reason I think that, is that it should be up to the administrators, not the apliers best friend saying ‘He really deserves this award’.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
item.dc:creator: @Criptic Criptic
item.description:
@Criptic wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:16, topic:83282”]well, a new home page might be a good idea, but more of just an modulation of it. We got the same background as the SRL forum I think. And maybe more interactive, and a flash edition maybe,

Also… I think that asking or demanding an award or extra things that is very rare, is just asking for you be removed from the “possible” list. I don’t think highly of themselves if they think they had already earned it, and I am the one to give it to them, but I think differently, and alters my opinion.[/quote]
il help with the homepage

RXVL:

Meh, anyways, how do you get a graphics award? I always wondered that…

earn it, post tuts, help with people open a siggy shop and post good sigs

item.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

RXVL:

I like the idea about the requirment of 300 posts to get in. That should keep out > 95% of all the spammers. And I like what Mod Taharok and someone else said about the home page, keep the format but just spruce it up a bit. And there should be a flash version of it, that would be really cool. Except for the fact that moparisthebest is boycotting adobe until they offer support for x64 bit browsers (I think thats the type.)

I still don’t like idea homepage is fine and if u ask for an award, imho, u don’t deserve it…

Read full topic

item.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

well, a new home page might be a good idea, but more of just an modulation of it. We got the same background as the SRL forum I think. And maybe more interactive, and a flash edition maybe,

Also… I think that asking or demanding an award or extra things that is very rare, is just asking for you be removed from the “possible” list. I don’t think highly of themselves if they think they had already earned it, and I am the one to give it to them, but I think differently, and alters my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

I disagree with the request an award idea, simply because random people would be requesting every cup in hope they would maybe get lucky and win one on a fluke or something, or it may make them steal others work for there own and try to win it with that. I like the way cups are being awarded as of now, but I think they should be awarded a bit more often.

item.title: 2 suggestions, Request an award and a new homepage
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:7, topic:83282”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=122351.msg1201393#msg1201393 date=1177292700]
Or the request forum would turn into a spam fest, which I wouldn’t doubt because of moparscape. Although if proper actions were taken to prevent the spamming the idea sounds like a good one.
[/quote]

The bolded was something that was unneeded. And also, the best way to prevent spam is to lock it. I think with the number of current Global Moderators, spam is not a very hard thing to handle at the moment.[/quote]
haha, that was really needed, I wasn’t implying that everyone from moparscape is a spammer I’m just saying that a lot are immature and would abuse the system.

Read full topic
